costs_other_party_paragraph: We do not expect that you will have to pay another party's costs. This only tends to arise in litigation and is therefore not relevant to your matter.
insert_current_position_and_scope_of_ret: You have recently resigned from your employment with ITAD and have been provided with a settlement (compromise) agreement by your former employer. You have asked us to review the draft agreement, advise you on its terms (including any waiver of claims, confidentiality, post-termination restrictions and tax provisions), and explain the legal and practical implications for you. We will also, if appropriate, liaise with your employer or their solicitors to request any reasonable amendments and then sign the adviser’s certificate to confirm that you have received independent legal advice on the agreement.
next_steps: for you to send us the full settlement agreement and any accompanying correspondence from your employer, for us to review the agreement and provide you with clear advice on its terms, and, if required, to liaise with your employer or their HR/solicitors regarding any amendments before signing the adviser’s certificate
realistic_timescale: 2-5 working days from receipt of the full agreement and your instructions
charges_estimate_paragraph: For advising you on your settlement agreement in line with the Initial Scope, our fees are fixed at £100 plus VAT, as agreed. This fixed fee covers our time spent reviewing the agreement, advising you on its terms, and completing the adviser’s certificate where appropriate.
disbursements_paragraph: We do not anticipate any disbursements (such as court fees or counsel’s fees) will be incurred for this work. If any unforeseen disbursements do arise, we will discuss these with you in advance wherever possible.
insert_next_step_you_would_like_client_t: Email us a complete copy of the settlement (compromise) agreement you have received from ITAD, together with any covering letter or email from your employer.
state_why_this_step_is_important: We need to see the full agreement and any accompanying information so that we can properly advise you on the terms and any deadlines.
insert_consequence: we may not be able to start work on your matter or provide advice within any deadline set by your employer
describe_first_document_or_information_y: • A complete copy of the settlement (compromise) agreement provided by ITAD, including all schedules and annexes.
describe_second_document_or_information_: • Any covering letter or email from your employer or their HR/solicitors explaining the agreement, including details of any deadlines for signing.
describe_third_document_or_information_y: • A brief summary from you of the circumstances leading to your resignation and any ongoing issues or concerns you have about the agreement.
next_stage: Review and advice on settlement agreement; completion of adviser’s certificate
in_total_including_vat_or_for_the_next_s: for the next steps in your matter
give_examples_of_what_your_estimate_incl: reviewing the settlement agreement, advising you on its terms, and completing the adviser’s certificate
